content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment in Munich. I am more than happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, before we begin our negotiation, may I ask what your preferred monthly rental budget is? This will help me determine if we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Maria Mamani: I'm sorry, I have some questions first. Can you tell me how much the monthly rental fee is for the apartment?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Maria. Based on our initial discussion, I am willing to rent the apartment to you for a monthly rental fee of 800 Euros. This fee includes all utilities and other expenses associated with the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Maria Mamani: I see. Can you tell me if this is the lowest price you can offer?

Mister Heine: Yes, Maria, I am willing to lower the rental fee to 750 Euros per month. However, this price is the lowest I can offer at this time.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Maria Mamani: Thank you for your offer, Mister Heine. I am interested in the apartment but I am looking for a lower rental fee. May I ask if you can lower the price even further?
name: Heinrich Heine
